text: 3:2 Matyu 4:17; Mak 1:15Egha ghaze, “God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam, a roghɨra ize. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia navibagh iragh.”3:2 Ziar kamning, “Kingdom Bilong God,” ko “Kingdom Bilong Heven,” aning God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam mɨgei. Ezɨ kagh Matyu osirizɨ Akar Aghuimɨn aven e ghaze, “God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam.”
